Below you are going to see the list of features available from this job site. You are going to know what are the different JS code, tools use on building this.

PROS
  • Employer can add jobs
  • Job Seeker can apply jobs
  • Basic Validation
  • Can filter by category, location and minimum salary
  • Total jobs added can be seen on the aside filters
  • Can also view how many applicants already apply on the job
CONS
  • Unable to delete job entries
  • No Database (Local storage only)
  • Added jobs are not send via email
  • Basic Design
Tools and JS code use
  • Pure Vanilla Javascript
  • ES6 Syntax
  • Some parts are Object Oriented
  • Local Storage
  • SASS
  • Webpack
  • Git
